choices: Politics are changing too fast today.
People don’t live in tribes any more
Migration has become impossible because of closed borders.
Abrupt climate change causes people to live off their land.

question: According to the passage, why is it difficult for the poor to survive now?

text: Political changes since the last ice age could make survival far more difficult for the world’s poor. During previous cooling periods, whole tribes simply picked up and moved south, but that option doesn’t work in the modern, tense world of closed borders. ‘To the extent that abrupt climate change may cause rapid and extensive changes of fortune for those who live off the land, the inability to migrate may remove one of the major safety nets for distressed people,’ says Terrence Joyce, who chairs the Woods Hole Physical Oceanography Department.
